## Description {#details}

Interface for Targets to specify which operations they can successfully select and how the others should be expanded most efficiently.

This implementation has been deprecated for a long time but it still in use in a few places.

<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The setAction calls record the non-size-changing legalization actions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// to take on specificly-sized types. The SizeChangeStrategy defines what</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// to do when the size of the type needs to be changed to reach a legally</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// sized type (i.e., one that was defined through a setAction call).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// e.g.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// setAction (&#123;G&#95;ADD, 0, LLT::scalar(32)&#125;, Legal);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// setLegalizeScalarToDifferentSizeStrategy(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   G&#95;ADD, 0, widenToLargerTypesAndNarrowToLargest);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// will end up defining getAction(&#123;G&#95;ADD, 0, T&#125;) to return the following</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// actions for different scalar types T:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///  LLT::scalar(1)..LLT::scalar(31): &#123;WidenScalar, 0, LLT::scalar(32)&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///  LLT::scalar(32):                 &#123;Legal, 0, LLT::scalar(32)&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///  LLT::scalar(33)..:               &#123;NarrowScalar, 0, LLT::scalar(32)&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If no SizeChangeAction gets defined, through this function,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the default is unsupportedForDifferentSizes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legacylegalizerinfo/#ac118cc8e04f71fc897c5a84874595eb0"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legacylegalizerinfo/#ac118cc8e04f71fc897c5a84874595eb0">setLegalizeScalarToDifferentSizeStrategy</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Opcode,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TypeIdx,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legacylegalizerinfo/#a2001432f616b09f569d6147c957948c3">SizeChangeStrategy</a> S) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OpcodeIdx = Opcode - FirstOp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ScalarSizeChangeStrategies&#91;OpcodeIdx&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#ac934769d93af95250952646a3829df4c">size</a>() &lt;= TypeIdx)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ScalarSizeChangeStrategies&#91;OpcodeIdx&#93;.resize(TypeIdx + 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ScalarSizeChangeStrategies&#91;OpcodeIdx&#93;&#91;TypeIdx&#93; = S;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   setLegalizeScalarToDifferentSizeStrategy(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// will result in getAction(&#123;G&#95;DIV, 0, T&#125;) to return Legal for s32 and s64,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// A SizeChangeStrategy for the common case where legalization for a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// particular vector operation consists of having more elements in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// vector, to a type that is legal. Unless there is no such type and then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// instead it should be legalized towards the widest vector that&#39;s still</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// legal. E.g.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   setAction(&#123;G&#95;ADD, LLT::vector(8, 8)&#125;, Legal);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   setAction(&#123;G&#95;ADD, LLT::vector(16, 8)&#125;, Legal);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   setAction(&#123;G&#95;ADD, LLT::vector(2, 32)&#125;, Legal);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   setAction(&#123;G&#95;ADD, LLT::vector(4, 32)&#125;, Legal);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   setLegalizeVectorElementToDifferentSizeStrategy(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     G&#95;ADD, 0, moreToWiderTypesAndLessToWidest);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// will result in the following getAction results:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   &#42; getAction(&#123;G&#95;ADD, LLT::vector(8,8)&#125;) returns</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///       (Legal, vector(8,8)).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   &#42; getAction(&#123;G&#95;ADD, LLT::vector(9,8)&#125;) returns</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///       (MoreElements, vector(16,8)).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   &#42; getAction(&#123;G&#95;ADD, LLT::vector(8,32)&#125;) returns</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///       (FewerElements, vector(4,32)).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legacylegalizerinfo/#a703c0ed452aea3693d8fe1441a935d5a">SizeAndActionsVec</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legacylegalizerinfo/#a619f20a86e6a67eb6ff2b3bd2dd8d67e"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legacylegalizerinfo/#a619f20a86e6a67eb6ff2b3bd2dd8d67e">moreToWiderTypesAndLessToWidest</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legacylegalizerinfo/#a703c0ed452aea3693d8fe1441a935d5a">SizeAndActionsVec</a> &amp;v) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/legacylegalizeactions">LegacyLegalizeActions</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">private</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Determine what action should be taken to legalize the given generic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// instruction opcode, type-index and type. Requires computeTables to have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// been called.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\returns a pair consisting of the kind of legalization that should be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// performed and the destination type.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::pair&lt;LegacyLegalizeActions::LegacyLegalizeAction, LLT&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlight">  getAspectAction(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instraspect">InstrAspect</a> &amp;Aspect) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The SizeAndActionsVec is a representation mapping between all natural</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// numbers and an Action. The natural number represents the bit size of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the InstrAspect. For example, for a target with native support for 32-bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// and 64-bit additions, you&#39;d express that as:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// setScalarAction(G&#95;ADD, 0,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///           &#123;&#123;1, WidenScalar&#125;,  // bit sizes &#91; 1, 31&#91;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///            &#123;32, Legal&#125;,       // bit sizes &#91;32, 33&#91;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///            &#123;33, WidenScalar&#125;, // bit sizes &#91;33, 64&#91;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///            &#123;64, Legal&#125;,       // bit sizes &#91;64, 65&#91;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///            &#123;65, NarrowScalar&#125; // bit sizes &#91;65, +inf&#91;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///           &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// It may be that only 64-bit pointers are supported on your target:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If an operation on a given vector type (say &lt;M x iN&gt;) isn&#39;t explicitly</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legacylegalizerinfo/#ae619fa147f84159a8a3f54e480ab2b85">SizeAndAction</a>: v) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   can be legalized towards (e.g. Legal, Lower, Libcall or Custom</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns the next action needed to get the scalar or pointer type closer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// to being legal</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// E.g. findLegalAction(&#123;G&#95;REM, 13&#125;) should return</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// (WidenScalar, 32). After that, findLegalAction(&#123;G&#95;REM, 32&#125;) will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// probably be called, which should return (Lower, 32).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This is assuming the setScalarAction on G&#95;REM was something like:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// setScalarAction(G&#95;REM, 0,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///           &#123;&#123;1, WidenScalar&#125;,  // bit sizes &#91; 1, 31&#91;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///            &#123;32, Lower&#125;,       // bit sizes &#91;32, 33&#91;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///            &#123;33, NarrowScalar&#125; // bit sizes &#91;65, +inf&#91;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///           &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::pair&lt;LegacyLegalizeActions::LegacyLegalizeAction, LLT&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><span class="doxyHighlight">  findScalarLegalAction(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InstrAspect &amp;Aspect) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
